item.title: 特朗普表示将于周五宣布美联储主席提名人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他将于周五上午宣布接替美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的人选。【原文：U.S. President ​Donald Trump ‌said he will announce ‌his pick to ​replace Federal Reserve ‍Chair Jerome Powell on ⁠Friday ‍morning.】

item.title: 英国商业信心减弱，因对整体经济前景的疑虑加剧
item.description: 劳埃德银行周五公布的一项调查显示，由于企业高管对全球经济前景的看法降至一年来最低点，英国商业信心在本月有所减弱。【原文：British business confidence has weakened this month after executives' view of the global economic outlook declined to its darkest in a year, a survey by Lloyds showed on Friday.】

item.title: 史赛克公司上调年度利润预期，得益于医疗器械强劲销售
item.description: 医疗设备制造商史赛克公司周四上调全年盈利预期，其植入物及其他医疗器械的强劲销售表现是主要支撑因素。【原文：Medical equipment maker Stryker raised its full-year profit forecast on Thursday, banking on strong sales of its implants and ​other medical devices.】

item.title: 日本首都1月核心通胀率放缓
item.description: 数据显示，日本首都1月份核心消费者价格同比上涨2.0%，较上月增速放缓，但符合日本央行的目标。【原文：Core consumer prices in Japan's capital rose 2.0% in January from a year earlier, data showed on Friday, slowing from the previous month but matching the central bank's target.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回指控强生公司滑石粉破产策略存在欺诈的诉讼
item.description: 美国一名地区法官周四驳回了一项诉讼，该诉讼指控强生公司通过反复试图利用空壳公司的破产程序来解决数万起诉讼，这些诉讼声称其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品会致癌。【原文：A U.S. district judge on Thursday dismissed a lawsuit alleging Johnson & Johnson committed fraud by repeatedly attempting to use a shell company's bankruptcy to resolve tens of thousands of lawsuits claiming its baby powder and other talc products caused cancer.】

item.title: 亿滋国际任命首席财务官扎拉梅拉为首席运营官，并开始物色新任财务主管
item.description: 亿滋国际宣布，其首席财务官卢卡·扎拉梅拉将于2月起兼任奥利奥生产商的首席运营官。【原文：Mondelez International announced that its finance chief, Luca Zaramella, would expand his role to be the Oreo maker's chief operating officer starting February.】

item.title: 科朗公司季度业绩超预期，得益于强劲的芯片制造设备需求
item.description: 周四公布的财报显示，科莱公司第二季度营收和利润均超出华尔街预期，这得益于企业大幅增加对该公司芯片制造设备的订单——这些设备用于生产先进的人工智能半导体。【原文：KLA Corp beat Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, as enterprises ramped up orders for its chip fabrication tools used to manufacture advanced artificial intelligence semiconductors.】

item.title: 富国银行首席执行官查理·沙夫薪酬上涨28%，达4000万美元
item.description: 富国银行周四在提交的文件中表示，已授予首席执行官查理·沙夫2025年度4000万美元薪酬，较上年同期的3120万美元增长28%。【原文：Wells Fargo awarded CEO Charlie Scharf $40 million in compensation for 2025, up 28% from $31.2 million a year earlier, the bank said in a filing on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁对向古巴供应石油的任何国家征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周四威胁对向古巴供应石油的国家加征新关税，加剧了对这个共产主义岛国的施压行动。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday threatened new tariffs on countries supplying oil to Cuba, escalating a pressure campaign against the Communist-run island.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片制造商艾克赛尔半导体计划通过香港IPO融资3.79亿美元
item.description: 中国人工智能芯片制造商艾克赛尔半导体公司周五提交的监管文件显示，该公司计划在香港首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集29.6亿港元（约合3.792亿美元）。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker Axera Semiconductor is aiming to raise HK$2.96 billion ($379.2 million) in an initial public offering in Hong Kong, a regulatory filing showed on Friday.】

item.title: 哈特福德保险公司第四季度利润因承保业务增强而大幅增长
item.description: 财产险公司哈特福德周四报告称，受承保业绩改善推动，其第四季度核心利润跃升33%。【原文：Property and casualty insurance firm The Hartford reported a 33% jump in fourth-quarter core profit on Thursday, driven by stronger underwriting performance.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，埃隆·马斯克旗下的SpaceX公司正考虑与特斯拉合并。
item.description: 据彭博新闻周四报道，知情人士透露，埃隆·马斯克旗下的SpaceX正考虑与特斯拉潜在合并的可能性，同时也在探索与人工智能公司xAI进行替代性整合的方案。【原文：Elon Musk's SpaceX is considering a potential merger ​with Tesla as well as ‌an alternative combination with artificial-intelligence company xAI, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 知情人士称，中铝公司与力拓集团即将宣布收购巴西CBA公司
item.description: 知情人士周四向路透社透露，中国铝业公司（Chinalco）与力拓集团（Rio Tinto）即将宣布收购巴西铝业生产商Companhia Brasileira de Aluminio（简称CBA）的控股权。【原文：The Aluminium Corporation of China (Chinalco) and Rio Tinto are close to announcing the purchase of control of Brazilian aluminium producer Companhia Brasileira de Aluminio , known as CBA, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 亚瑟·J·加拉格尔季度利润因手续费与佣金增长而上升
item.description: 亚瑟·J·加拉格尔公司周四公布的数据显示，其第四季度经调整利润增长24.5%，这家保险经纪公司受益于稳健需求带来的佣金和费用增长。【原文：Arthur J. Gallagher posted 24.5% rise in fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Thursday, as the insurance broker benefited from stronger commissions and fees amid solid demand.】

item.title: 彭博新闻报道，Perplexity与微软签署7.5亿美元人工智能云服务协议
item.description: 彭博社周四援引知情人士消息报道称，人工智能初创公司Perplexity已与微软签署价值7.5亿美元的协议，将使用其Azure云服务。【原文：AI startup Perplexity has signed a $750 million agreement with Microsoft to use its Azure cloud service, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 交易日 波动性飙升，科技股崩盘
item.description: 周四全球市场剧烈震荡，美国对伊朗发动袭击的担忧与政府再度停摆的威胁令油价和金属价格剧烈波动，而人工智能泡沫的忧虑则重创科技股，纳斯达克指数和标普500指数双双转跌。【原文：Volatility coursed through world markets on Thursday as fears over a U.S. strike on Iran and threat of another U.S. government shutdown rattled oil and metals, while AI bubble fears hammered tech stocks and pushed the Nasdaq and S&P 500 into the red.】

item.title: 前谷歌工程师因窃取人工智能机密为中国公司服务被判有罪
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，前谷歌软件工程师丁林伟因窃取美国科技巨头的人工智能商业机密，以谋取其秘密合作的两家中国公司利益，于周四被旧金山联邦陪审团裁定有罪。【原文：Former Google software engineer Linwei Ding was convicted by a federal jury in San Francisco on Thursday of stealing AI trade secrets from the U.S. tech giant to benefit two Chinese companies he was secretly working for, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Thursday.】

item.title: 西部数据预计季度营收将超预期，得益于强劲的存储需求
item.description: 西部数据周四预测第三季度营收将超出华尔街预期，表明其硬盘和人工智能服务器闪存存储设备的需求将继续推动增长。【原文：Western Digital forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, signaling that demand for its hard ​drives and flash storage for AI servers would ‌continue to drive growth.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，美国正考虑借助罗宾汉平台为儿童开设"特朗普账户"。
item.description: 据彭博新闻周四报道，美国政府正考虑选择金融科技公司罗宾汉市场（Robinhood Markets）来承担监督其为数百万儿童设立的"特朗普账户"的关键职责。该报道援引知情人士消息称。【原文：The U.S. government is considering selecting fintech Robinhood Markets for a key role in overseeing "Trump accounts" it is creating for millions of children, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚九号台以5.99亿澳元收购QMS，数字优先战略重组中剥离广播业务
item.description: 澳大利亚九号娱乐集团周五宣布，将以8.5亿澳元（约合5.9908亿美元）的无现金无债务交易方式，从Quadrant私募股权公司收购数字户外广告公司QMS传媒。【原文：Australia's Nine Entertainment said on Friday will acquire digital outdoor advertising firm QMS Media from Quadrant Private Equity for A$850 million ($599.08 million) on a cash‑ and debt‑free basis.】

item.title: 主要航空公司敦促国会确保政府停摆期间空中交通管制员的薪资支付
item.description: 美国主要航空公司周四敦促国会，在政府部分停摆期间继续支付空中交通管制员的薪资。去年秋季长达43天的政府停摆曾导致航空业遭受重大冲击。【原文：Major U.S. airlines on Thursday urged Congress to pay air traffic controllers in the event of a partial government shutdown after the industry suffered a major disruption during a 43-day standoff last fall.】

item.title: 苹果销售额和利润超出华尔街预期，iPhone需求"惊人"
item.description: 苹果公司周四公布的季度营收超出华尔街预期，得益于iPhone需求强劲以及中国市场的强劲反弹。首席执行官蒂姆·库克向路透社表示，最新款手机的需求"令人震惊"。【原文：Apple beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue ​on Thursday, powered by strong demand for its iPhones and a sharp rebound in China, with CEO Tim Cook telling Reuters that demand ‌for the latest handsets was "staggering."】

item.title: 查尔斯·施瓦布银行首席执行官保罗·伍尔韦即将退休
item.description: 查尔斯·施瓦布公司周四宣布，施瓦布银行首席执行官保罗·伍尔韦伊将在7月1日正式退休，结束其在公司长达十六年的职业生涯。【原文：Charles Schwab said on Thursday that CEO of Schwab Bank Paul Woolway will retire from his role, effective July 1, after over sixteen years with the company.】

item.title: 独家：五角大楼与Anthropic就军事人工智能使用问题发生冲突——消息人士透露
item.description: 五角大楼与人工智能开发商Anthropic就可能取消安全保障措施存在分歧，这些措施可能允许政府利用其技术自主瞄准武器并开展美国国内监控，三位知情人士向路透社透露。【原文：The Pentagon and artificial-intelligence developer Anthropic are at odds over potentially eliminating safeguards that might allow the government to use its technology to target weapons autonomously and conduct U.S. domestic surveillance, three people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 维萨季度利润因支付量强劲增长而上升
item.description: 维萨公司周四报告称，受美国消费者支出韧性支撑，持卡人在假日季刷卡消费增加，推动其第一季度利润上升。【原文：Visa reported a rise in first-quarter profit on Thursday, as cardholders swiped more during the holiday season, buoyed by resilient U.S. consumer spending.】

item.title: 美国财政部加强货币监控标准，但未发现操纵行为
item.description: 美国财政部周四表示，将加强对各国外汇操作的审查力度，包括任何试图阻止本币对美元贬值的举措，但并未指控任何主要贸易伙伴操纵汇率。【原文：The U.S. Treasury on Thursday said it is strengthening scrutiny of countries' foreign exchange practices, including ​any efforts to resist depreciation of their currencies against ‌the dollar, but did not accuse any major trading partner of currency manipulation.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会将发布"事件合约"监管规定
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会主席周四表示，该机构将起草新规监管蓬勃发展的所谓"事件合约"市场，为监管政治和体育博彩的公司扫清障碍。【原文：The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission will draft new regulations governing the burgeoning market for so-called event contracts, removing obstacles for companies that oversee wagers on politics and sports, the agency's leader said on Thursday.】

item.title: 解读：埃隆·马斯克为何要在太空部署人工智能数据中心？
item.description: 路透社周四独家报道，埃隆·马斯克旗下的SpaceX与xAI拟议合并，此举可能为马斯克的卫星数据中心轨道部署计划注入新动力。在与谷歌母公司Alphabet、Meta和OpenAI等科技巨头展开的激烈人工智能竞赛中，马斯克正全力争夺技术主导权。【原文：A proposed merger between Elon Musk's SpaceX and xAI, reported exclusively by Reuters on Thursday, could give fresh momentum to Musk's plan to launch satellite data centers into orbit as he battles for supremacy in the rapidly escalating AI race against tech giants like Alphabet's Google, Meta and OpenAI.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亚马逊正与OpenAI洽谈，拟对其投资高达500亿美元。
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，知情人士透露，亚马逊正与OpenAI洽谈投资事宜，投资额可能高达500亿美元。【原文：Amazon is in talks to invest as much as $50 billion in OpenAI, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加州加速推进特朗普反对的电动汽车法规与税收优惠政策，州最高空气监管机构表示
item.description: 加州官员本周正与底特律汽车制造商举行会谈，商讨针对轿车和卡车的下一阶段温室气体排放法规，该州最高空气监管机构表示。【原文：California officials are meeting Detroit automakers this week to discuss the next phase of greenhouse gas regulations for cars and trucks, the state's top air regulator said.】
